author: Johnny Ofria
comment: This app DOES NOT WORK! with the LG G watch despite having to uninstall and reinstall the watch several times. Don't waste your money! get Watch phone instead, brings all your contacts in the watch with no problem

author: Kay Dee McCoy
comment: This app use to work awesome. Now its fallen into the cracks of Android, because of no updates. With Android now on Marshmallow, and the upcoming N, this was built around Lollipop. I can go into the app, set my contacts and it sometimes removes the contacts. But instead of it resyncing itself, I have to uncheck and then recheck those I want to save to my watch. Late update was in 2015 and its now almost 2017... Any updates scheduled
title: Needs Serious Updating

author: Nrseife S
comment: Great app. Even better if the developer adds the option to load address info and address notes....

reply.author: Joseph O. De Guzman
reply.content:
HI Nrseife,

I will consider your suggestion on the next update. Thank you for your support.

title: Add address and notes?

author: zoj De Guzman
comment: Useful coz my phones gets drained faster than my watch and i can still see my emergency contacts
